component.name: godotGem
component.summary: Controller client to emulate an xbox360 controller for windows

description.p: Turn your steam deck into a windows controller (Or use any controller from a Linux PC on windows). Connect linux to windows over the network in order to bind an emulated controller on windows to the same inputs you're doing on linux. Useful for playing games that might lack support for your controller out of the box, or just need another controller despite running out of USB ports
Other controllers likely work too as long as the godot game engine supports it.
Note: you will need to install ViGEm and the godotGem server on windows. (See releases: https://github.com/iSlammedMyKindle/godotGem/releases)
